pl.mazurmarcin.webcalculator.controller

Class AdminController

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.mazurmarcin.webcalculator.controller.AdminController

  • @Controller
 @RequestMapping(value="/administrator-panel")
public class AdminController
extends Object
    The controller class is used to return the view depending on the user request. This controller contains the views of:
    • "dashboard"
    • "parts/contact-form-message-table"
    • "parts/message-modal"
    • "statistics"
    Author:
    Marcin Mazur

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AdminController(ContactFormMessageService contactFormMessageService, CalculatorStatService calculatorStatService)
      Constructs an AdminController with the ContactFormMessageService and CalculatorStatService

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String geContactFormMessageList(String listType, org.springframework.ui.Model theModel, Integer resultStartRange)
      Returns the view of "parts/contact-form-message-table" with model attributes:
      contactFormMessageList - The list of contact form messages totalResults - The length of the list
      String getAdminMessageModal(Long contactFormMessageId, org.springframework.ui.Model theModel)
      Returns the view of "parts/message-modal" with model attributes:
      commentsList - The list of Comments contactFormMessage - The ContactFormMessage object
      String getSearchContactFormMessageList(String listType, org.springframework.ui.Model theModel, String searchFormName, String searchFormEmail, String searchFormSubject, String searchFormStartDate, String searchFormEndDate)
      Returns the view of "parts/contact-form-message-table" limited by search parameters and given date range with model attributes:
      contactFormMessageList - The list of contact form messages totalResults - The length of the list
      String showContactFormMessages()
      Returns the view of "contact-form-messages"
      String showDashboard(org.springframework.ui.Model theModel, Locale locale)
      Returns the view of "dashboard" with model attribute:
      numberOfUnreadContactFormMessage - The number of unread contact form messages
      String showStatisticsPage(org.springframework.ui.Model theModel)
      Returns the view of "statistics" with model attribute:
      generalStatisticsResultSet - The result set of general statistics

      • geContactFormMessageList

        @RequestMapping(value="/get-contact-form-messages")
public String geContactFormMessageList(@RequestParam(name="listType")
                                                                                            String listType,
                                                                                            org.springframework.ui.Model theModel,
                                                                                            @RequestParam(required=false,name="resultStartRange")
                                                                                            Integer resultStartRange)
        Returns the view of "parts/contact-form-message-table" with model attributes:
        • contactFormMessageList - The list of contact form messages
        • totalResults - The length of the list
        Parameters:
        listType - The String containing the type of the list ( new - archive - all )
        theModel - The Model containing the data passed to the view
        resultStartRange - The Integer containing the number of results to be returned
        Returns:
        The String representing the name of the view

      • getSearchContactFormMessageList

        @RequestMapping(value="/get-search-contact-form-messages")
public String getSearchContactFormMessageList(@RequestParam(name="listType")
                                                                                                          String listType,
                                                                                                          org.springframework.ui.Model theModel,
                                                                                                          @RequestParam(required=false,name="searchFormName")
                                                                                                          String searchFormName,
                                                                                                          @RequestParam(required=false,name="searchFormEmail")
                                                                                                          String searchFormEmail,
                                                                                                          @RequestParam(required=false,name="searchFormSubject")
                                                                                                          String searchFormSubject,
                                                                                                          @RequestParam(required=false,name="searchFormStartDate")
                                                                                                          String searchFormStartDate,
                                                                                                          @RequestParam(required=false,name="searchFormEndDate")
                                                                                                          String searchFormEndDate)
        Returns the view of "parts/contact-form-message-table" limited by search parameters and given date range with model attributes:
        • contactFormMessageList - The list of contact form messages
        • totalResults - The length of the list
        Parameters:
        listType - The String containing the type of the list ( new - archive - all )
        theModel - The String containing the The Model containing the data passed to the view
        searchFormName - The String containing the name of the sender
        searchFormEmail - The String containing the email of the sender
        searchFormSubject - The String containing the subject of the message
        searchFormStartDate - The String containing the first day of the range
        searchFormEndDate - The String containing the last day of the range
        Returns:
        The String representing the name of the view
